price: E os que unem o que Allah ordena estar unido, e receiam a seu Senhor e temem o pior ajuste de contas,
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَصِلُونَ مَآ أَمَرَ ٱللَّهُ بِهِۦٓ أَن يُوصَلَ وَيَخۡشَوۡنَ رَبَّهُمۡ وَيَخَافُونَ سُوٓءَ ٱلۡحِسَابِ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna yaṣilūna mā amara al-lahu bihi an yūṣala wayakhshawna rabbahum wayakhāfūna sūa al-ḥisābi
